archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Manage Balance Policies
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Executing policies per balance or balance type.

properties.value: Balance policies are rules that describe how balance affecting events are to be handled. This is done by comparing the value of each event against criteria such as the following: - a minimum allowable balance limit (e.g. balance must remain above zero), - balance expiration dates, - balance thresholds actions and notifications and - roll-over & cyclic policies.
